trans-unit.source: Describes the serialization format for <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> columns in a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Describe el formato de serialización para las columnas <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataSetDateTime> cannot be set on non-<xref:System.DateTime> columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataSetDateTime> no se puede establecer en no son<xref:System.DateTime> columnas.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> property with the default value UnspecifiedLocall on non-<xref:System.DateTime> columns is permitted.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> propiedad con el valor predeterminado UnspecifiedLocall en no son<xref:System.DateTime> se permiten columnas.

trans-unit.source: Modifying the column data type from <xref:System.DateTime> to any other type resets the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> to the default value UnspecifiedLocal.
trans-unit.target: Modificar el tipo de datos de columna de <xref:System.DateTime> a cualquier otro tipo restablece el <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> con el valor predeterminado de valor UnspecifiedLocal.

trans-unit.source: Checking schema for merging, Relations, and ForeignKeyConstraints can be performed between <xref:System.DateTime> columns with matching <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: La comprobación de esquema para combinar, relaciones y ForeignKeyConstraints pueden realizarse entre <xref:System.DateTime> columnas con la coincidencia de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the columns should be considered as non-matching on schema.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, las columnas deben considerarse no coincidente en el esquema.

trans-unit.source: The only exception is between Unspecified and UnspecifiedLocal.
trans-unit.target: La única excepción es entre Unspecified y UnspecifiedLocal.

trans-unit.source: It is permitted to have a relation or a `ForeignKeyConstraint` between two `DateTime` columns with one in `Unspecified` and other in `UnspecifiedLocal`<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se permite tener una relación o un `ForeignKeyConstraint` entre dos `DateTime` columnas con uno en `Unspecified` y otros en `UnspecifiedLocal` <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DateTimeMode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="DateTime" /> is always stored in Local.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DateTime" /> siempre se almacena en Local.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> or <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" /> is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into Local.
trans-unit.target: Si en este modo se asigna <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> o <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" /> a una columna, se convierte primero a Local.

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode is always performed in Local.
trans-unit.target: La serialización en este modo siempre se realiza en Local.

trans-unit.source: There is an offset during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Hay un desplazamiento durante la serialización.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="DateTime" /> is always stored in Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DateTime" /> siempre se almacena en Unspecified.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> or <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" />.
trans-unit.target: Si en este modo se asigna <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> o <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> a una columna, se convierte primero a <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" />.

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode does not cause an offset.
trans-unit.target: La serialización en este modo no produce un desplazamiento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="DateTime" /> is stored in Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DateTime" /> se almacena en Unspecified.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> or <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" />.
trans-unit.target: Si en este modo se asigna <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> o <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Utc" /> a una columna, se convierte primero a <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" />.

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode causes offset.
trans-unit.target: La serialización en este modo produce desplazamiento.

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior and is backward compatible.
trans-unit.target: Es el comportamiento predeterminado y es compatible con versiones anteriores.

trans-unit.source: This option should be thought of as being Unspecified in storage but applying an offset that is similar to <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Se debe considerar que esta opción es igual a Unspecified en lo que se refiere al almacenamiento, aunque aplica un desplazamiento similar al de <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> durante la serialización.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="DateTime" /> is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DateTime" /> se almacena en la hora universal coordinada (UTC).

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> or <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" /> is assigned to a column in this mode, it is first converted into <see langword="Utc" /> format.
trans-unit.target: Si en este modo se asigna <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Local" /> o <see cref="F:System.Data.DataSetDateTime.Unspecified" /> a una columna, se convierte primero a <see langword="Utc" />.

trans-unit.source: Serialization in this mode is always performed in <see langword="Utc" />.
trans-unit.target: La serialización en este modo siempre se realiza en <see langword="Utc" />.

trans-unit.source: There is no offset during serialization.
trans-unit.target: No hay desplazamiento durante la serialización.
